sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Footer from "./common/Footer"; import ScriptTag from "react-script-tag"; import AOS from "aos"; let ref_url = localStorage["refState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["refState"]).refURL : ""; // console.log(ref_url); export default class Faq extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); AOS.init(); } componentWillReceiveProps() { AOS.refresh(); } render() { return (

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

{/*

What kind of members make up the sapio community?

..

*/}

What kind of people are Members of Sapio Community?

We have two kinds of Citizen members African Citizens - People of the african decent both home and abroad.

Non African Citizen (for people who wish to live in Africa, are married to an African, do business in Africa and or generally support the well being and growth and development of Africa.

Citizen members are referred to as siblings in the Sapio community. There is simply no one prevailing characteristic of Sapio members other than the love for intelligence/ a high IQ , Africa, love for humanity and the sustainability of Mankind.

It’s tailored to meet the needs of both established and emerging business leaders, top executives in finance and business, change-makers, visionaries and social entrepreneurs with a diverse roster of high-profile celebrities, athletes, politicians, cooperate bodies, designers and so on as founding members fueling Africa's socio economic & political growth and an all round development of Africa.

With each of our services, we seek to help members and their companies by creating opportunities to grow their business at home and abroad providing, where possible, strategic marketing connections while offering access to a number of high quality benefits, products and services.

There are members for whom the community provides a sense of family, business networking connections, casual social activity and so on but for many people, it’s simply a stimulating opportunity for the mind.

What opinions does The Sapio Community have?

Our community takes no domineering or forceful stand on politics, religion or social issues. Our Siblings are from so many different countries and cultures with differing points of view that for ours to espouse a particular point of view would go against its role as a forum for all points of view.

Though Intriguing and interestingly, individual sibling members often have strong opinions and several of them, It’s said that in a room with 12 sapio siblings, you will find at least 13 differing opinions on any given subject!

How do I qualify to join the Sapio Community?

Membership in the Sapio club house is by “Invitation only”. Our Community is only open to persons who have attained a 65%score within the upper two percent of the general population on our IQ analysis approved intelligence test that has been properly administered and supervised.

Followed by two referral invitations of citizens of the Sapio community. Citizen members have the privilege of proposing suitable colleagues, friends, family members and business associates for membership. 

Lastly, and an in-depth understanding of one’s responsibility in becoming a citizen.

- Be Sapiosexual

- Be discreet and have a flair for privacy.

- Have a track record of sophistication, generosity, hard work and intelligence.

- Have respect for diversity.

- Possess some form of economic, social and or political capital.

- Must be able to carry a lot of positive social clout.

- Be valuable and add substantial value.

If you think you fit all of these and are interested in being a citizen, please email us  info@sapioclub with a short profile attached with your social media or LinkedIn profile explaining why you should be accepted, followed by your members referral and a non refundable verification fee. (Terms of engagement will be communicated to accepted members.)

There is no other qualification or disqualification for initial membership eligibility, except making sure that people understand what the club is about and their roles and duties required of them.

Why Should I Join The Sapio Club?

There are many intelligent reasons to join. Whether you actively attend our meetings or simply relish the intellectual stimulation that membership promotes, you'll find the benefits of Sapio membership to be numerous indeed.

Our members only live, work, learn and earn club house offers an elegant, contemporary and welcoming ambience where members mix and meet to exchange ideas, build relationships and entertain their guests.

Does Sapio Provide Intellectual Stimulation?

Think-two-three, think-two-three! Sapio provides intriguing ways to flex your mental muscles.

It is a Club committed to the highest level of comfort and cuisine, exceptional events and an unmatched level of personal service at home and abroad.

You'll find intellectual resources, E courses, webinars, videos etc. In our members only data base, at regional, national and international conventions.

Whatever your passion, there's almost certain to be a Special Interest Group (SIG) filled with other Sapio siblings who share it! We offer approximately over 200 SIGs, in mind-boggling profusion. Along the way you'll find microbiology, and systems analysis, but you'll also find Sherlock Holmes, chocolate and Star Trek, the expected: investment, mentorship, economics, Female empowerment, relationship counselling, sports, youths in leadership, politics, finances, bread making, winemaking, cartooning, silversmithing, photography, Videography, agriculture, business as a whole.

The idea is to have SIG’s that address various needs and concern, to link people and create business opportunities. Any Sibling who can't find an SIG to join can easily start one.

Does Sapio Community Provide Social Interaction?

Our meetings are anything but dull! Local groups meet at least monthly. Often it's for dinner and drinks on a Friday- Monday night, or for get-togethers featuring a speaker or a lively, freewheeling discussion. All are with fellow members who share your intellectual interests. Some groups have special get-togethers or activities throughout the month. Others, especially the larger groups, have events nearly every day. Of course, participation in local group activities is always entirely at your option.

There are also widely attended annual conventions offering workshops, trainings, seminars, and parties, plus numerous regional gatherings are held each year, offering social and intellectual excitement.

Can Sapio Help My Community?

Sapio members find opportunities to contribute to the betterment of society through volunteer activities within their communities. Many Sapio groups offer and promote social entrepreneurship, welfare amongst group members, access to information’s scholarships for gifted students, and opportunities to contribute to a better society and the club. Join a team in your local community Become a Volunteer with our parent foundation G-1st International. www.G1st.org

Become a
Member!

Join the community of Intellectuals.

Join Now
{/*/main*/}
{/* Template Main JS File */} ); } }
